name: A Tiny Hike
description:
A Tiny Hike

For Ali.

A hiking simulator game for the Nintendo Gameboy!

In this game you will play as Ali, a hiker determined to find a special place on her trail she hasn't seen since she was a kid. She has been trying to find this place and perhaps herself.  Will you be able to find what she is looking for?

Download the .gb ROM file below OR play right now in the web browser above!

(Playing on original hardware will give you the best experience!)

  Controls: 

Move(d-pad): WASD

A button(interact): L

B button (back): K

  Credits:

Created by:

Kevin Neilson

Art by:

GibbonGL

Sodacoma

Sound Effects by:

Coffee 'Valley' Bat

Music, "A Waltz 4 One" written by:

Kevin Neilson

  Afterword:

This is 1 of 4 games I built for my friends this year for Christmas! 

A Tiny Hike was built for my friend Ali. 

She loves to go camping and loves adventure games! Thanks Ali for giving me the inspiration to not only build, but finish a story-based game this year!!!
